dialogue.message: Hi there! I’ve been trying to install the latest update for your design software for hours. It keeps failing at 75% with an ‘unknown error.’ What’s wrong?
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Let me help troubleshoot. Could you share a screenshot of the error message and confirm your operating system version?
Sure, it’s Windows 11. Here’s the screenshot: [image link]. I’ve restarted twice, same issue.
This is a known conflict with third-party antivirus tools. Could you temporarily disable your antivirus and retry? I’ll also send a direct download link as a workaround.
Oh, disabling the antivirus worked! Installation completed. Thanks for your help!
You’re welcome! Let us know if you need further assistance. Have a great day!
Hi, this is urgent! Your API is rejecting our payment gateway integration. Error: ‘Invalid SSL certificate.’ Our cert is valid and up-to-date!
Could you share the output from openssl s_client -connect yourgateway.com:443?
Here’s the terminal output: [text]. See? No errors here.
Our system requires TLS 1.3, but your server supports only up to TLS 1.2. Upgrading the protocol will resolve the authentication error.
Upgrading worked! Thanks for the quick fix!
Happy to help! Don’t hesitate to reach out for future issues.
Hi, I’m really frustrated. Your smart home app crashes every time I try to connect my older thermostat model. It worked fine on my old phone!
Could you confirm your phone model and app version?
iPhone 15, app version 5.2.1. The thermostat is Model HT-2019.
Unfortunately, HT-2019 isn’t supported in versions after 5.0. We can roll back your app to 4.9 or offer a discount on a compatible thermostat. What works best for you?
I’ll take the discount, but this is disappointing.
I’ll email the discount code shortly. We appreciate your patience!
Hello! My project data isn’t syncing between my laptop and tablet. Changes on one device don’t show up on the other. Can you help?
Are both devices logged into the same account? Could you share the sync logs?
Yes, same account. Here’s a log from my tablet: [file attached].
The log shows a corrupted sync token. I’ll reset it manually. Go to Settings > Sync > Force Full Sync and wait 10 minutes.
It’s syncing now! Will this happen again?
A patch releasing next week will prevent this issue. Thanks for your patience!
Good morning! I’m having an issue where my app keeps saying ‘no internet connection,’ but my Wi-Fi is working fine. Other apps load normally.
Let’s check the app’s network permissions. Go to Settings > Apps > [App Name] > Permissions. Is ‘Local Network’ enabled?
Hmm, it was off! I just turned it on, but still no luck.
Please clear the app cache: Settings > Storage > Clear Cache. Then log in again. Does that help?
That fixed it! Thank you! Any idea why this happened suddenly?
A recent update may have reset permissions. We’ll flag this to our dev team.
